Summary: 4 tanish white men/animal/alien with 1 kid that was bloddy
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mars Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving out around the mountain in mars hill maine on the pierce road with a friend around 12:50 a.m almost 1:00 a.m and my girl friend was driving my vehicle and we were driving about 50 mph and out of no wheres 4 whiteish\alien looking things that were roughly 7ft tall ran right out in front of us and we jammed on the breaks and the 4 of them ran off but right after we stoped they had a little kid type alien that was on the other side of the road and it was all bloody. right after when seeen them we didn't know what to think my girl friend started crying and i was extremely shocked and i asked her what she just seen and she seen the same things as me
